text:
*AppDynamics is hiring a Content Marketing Lead* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

AppDynamics, part of Cisco, is hiring a content marketing lead. This person will lead global content marketing strategy and work closely with Campaigns, Demand, Growth, Product Marketing, Customer Marketing, PR, etc. to ensure we are crafting the right content to achieve our goals and objectives -- from organic growth to net new leads.

This role is likely a good fit for you if youâ€™re both strategic and tactical, and have a bias for action. Let me know if you have any questions!

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/34kLhXT>

<@U022QJHJ118>

attachments.title: AppD Content Marketing Lead
attachments.text: Apply for AppD Content Marketing Lead job with Cisco in San Francisco, California, US. Read about the role and find out if it's right for you.
